T02D2144:219a-1: aa pa re mi ta a'a yu ho ma bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D2144:219a-3: tshe dpag tu med pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba //
T02D2144:219a-4: mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2144:219a-6: sbyin sreg gis ni las rnams 'grub //
T02D2144:219a-7: las kyi mchog rab sbyin sreg go //
T02D2144:219a-8: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //
T02D2144:219a-9: dbang dang drag po mngon spyod do //
T02D2144:219a-10: zhib thab khud zlum po nyid //
T02D2144:219a-11: rgyas pa gru bzhi zlag ma dbang //
T02D2144:219a-12: mngon spyod zur gsum nyid du bya //
T02D2144:219a-13: khru gang khru do khru gang ba //
T02D2144:219a-14: sor mo nyi shu kha dog nag / dkar ser dmar pa nyid du bya //
T02D2144:219a-15: mchod rdzas yam shing d'ur ba sogs //
T02D2144:219a-16: sreg rdzas g-yas g-yon rim pa bzhin //
T02D2144:219a-17: shar du zhi ba byang du rgyas //
T02D2144:219a-18: dbang la nub dang drag po lho //
T02D2144:219a-19: ram las me lha kha dog dmar /
T02D2144:219a-20: dbyu gu ril ba spyi blugs dang //
T02D2144:219a-21: bgrang phreng g-yon dang g-yas su bsam //
T02D2144:219a-22: ral pa cod pan gsus khyim che //
T02D2144:219a-23: tshangs skud chang la ye shes bstim //
T02D2144:219a-24: rigs bdag rnams kyis dbu brgyan nas //
T02D2144:219a-25: mchod yon zhabs bsil la sogs dbul //
T02D2144:219a-26: dgong blugs dbul la mtshan ma brtags //
T02D2144:219a-27: kha dog sgra dang dbyibs dang dri //
T02D2144:219a-28: zla ba rgyas pa du ba med //
T02D2144:219a-29: nad med sdig pa ma lus zad //
T02D2144:219a-30: dung dang rdza rnga pi wang dang //
T02D2144:219a-31: bde ba ma lus 'phel bar byed //
T02D2144:219a-32: tsandan ga pur aa ga ru //
T02D2144:219a-33: dge zhing tshe ring dpal gyi gnas //
T02D2144:219a-34: bkra shis rdzas brgyad rgyal mtshan gdugs //
T02D2144:219b-0: @219b sgrub pa po rnams dge ba'i rtags //
T02D2144:219b-1: ngan pa de las bzlog pa'o //
T02D2144:219b-2: rta mgrin rgyal pos bsrung ba bya /
T02D2144:219b-3: de nas sreg rdzas rim gyis dbul //
T02D2144:219b-4: mar dang yam shing til dang zho //
T02D2144:219b-5: 'bras so nas dang sran ma dang //
T02D2144:219b-6: grem dang d'ur ba ku sha rnams //
T02D2144:219b-8: aom bo dhi briksh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2144:219b-9: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2144:219b-10: aom sarba sam pa de sv'a h'a /
T02D2144:219b-11: aom badzra pushta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2144:219b-12: aom badzra bi dza ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2144:219b-13: aom ma h'a be ga ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2144:219b-14: aom ma h'a ba la ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2144:219b-15: aom badzra ghasma ri ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2144:219b-16: aom badzra a'a yu she ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2144:219b-17: aom aa pra ti ha ta badzra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2144:219b-18: me lha bstod cing gsol ba gdab //
T02D2144:219b-19: de nas me lha'i thugs ka ru ;
T02D2144:219b-20: / dkyil 'khor bskyed cing ye shes bstim //
T02D2144:219b-21: mchod yon zhabs bsil la sogs dbul //
T02D2144:219b-22: khu ba la sogs zhal du mchod //
T02D2144:219b-23: yam shing ku sha 'od la dbul //
T02D2144:219b-25: khyad par d'ur ba brgya rtsa ni //
T02D2144:219b-26: tshe 'phel ched du dbul bar bya ;
T02D2144:219b-27: / a'a yu pushtim ku ru aom /
T02D2144:219b-28: 'o ma sgrad rtsi ka ra dang /
T02D2144:219b-29: bdud rtsi lnga dang sbyar ba'i rdzas //
T02D2144:219b-30: slob dpon g-yon gyi mthe'u chung gis //
T02D2144:219b-31: slob ma'i g-yas kyi mthe'u chung gzung //
T02D2144:219b-32: lan gsum bskor bas lha la dbul //
T02D2144:219b-33: dngos grub rdzas kyi lhag med //
T02D2144:219b-34: slob ma rnams la sbyin bar bya //
T02D2144:219b-35: aom badzra a'a yu she aa mri ta siddhi h'um //
T02D2144:219b-36: zhi ba sv'a h'a dang sbyar ba //
T02D2144:219b-37: rgyas pa aom la dbang la ho //
T02D2144:219b-38: drag po ma r'a ya phat sbyar //
T02D2144:219b-39: dkyil 'khor lha la mchod cing bstod //
T02D2144:219b-40: ye shes gshegs su gsol ba dang //
T02D2144:219b-41: dam tshig bdag la bsdu bar bya //
T02D2144:219b-42: dkyil 'khor lha ni mchod ster ro //
T02D2144:219b-43: me yis 'dod pa'i don grub byed //
T02D2144:219b-44: yam shing gzi brjid ster bar byed //
T02D2144:219b-46: til gyis sdig pa 'dag pa dang //
T02D2144:219b-47: zho zan gyis ni rig pa 'phel //
T02D2144:219b-51: gro dang sran mas nad kun sel //
T02D2144:219b-52: d'ur bas tshe ring nad med do //
T02D2144:219b-53: ku shas bar chad srung bar byed //
T02D2144:219b-54: 'o ma sbrang rtsis dngos grub ster //
T02D2144:219b-55: dpal 'phel ba ni bung shing ngo //
T02D2144:220a-2: tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa mchod pa'i rdzas //
T02D2144:220a-3: thabs dang shes rab gzar bu ste //
T02D2144:220a-4: bdud rtsi mar gyis tshim byed pa //
T02D2144:220a-5: mchod pa gzhan gyis ci zhig bya //
T02D2144:220a-6: thog mar dben pa'i gdas nyid du //
T02D2144:220a-7: thabs dang mched rdzas bshams pa ni //
T02D2144:220a-9: rgyas pa 'bras bu can gyi shing //
T02D2144:220a-10: dbang la tsandan dmar po dang //
T02D2144:220a-11: drag po tsher ma can la bya //
T02D2144:220a-12: rgya phyed dpangs dang ldan pa dang //
T02D2144:220a-14: slob dpon bdag nyid 'dug pa dang //
T02D2144:220a-16: g-yas su sreg rdzas rim gyis gzhag / g-yon du bum pa mchod rdzas bsham //
T02D2144:220a-17: lha yi rnal 'byor bskyed pa dang //
T02D2144:220a-18: sngags kyi bzlas pas rab tu tshim //
T02D2144:220a-19: bum par rta mchog bskyed par bya //
T02D2144:220a-20: sngags bzlas bar chad bsrung bar bya //
T02D2144:220a-21: de bas bram ze rgyun bzhag me //
T02D2144:220a-22: bslangs la sbar bar bya ba dang //
T02D2144:220a-23: dang po 'jig rten me lha mchod //
T02D2144:220a-24: gnyis pa dkyil 'khor dgyes par tshim //
T02D2144:220a-25: gsum pa me lha gtang rag dbul //
T02D2144:220a-26: de nas ye shes gshegs dang dam tshig bsdu //
T02D2144:220a-27: me mnal thal ba chu bor dor //
T02D2144:220a-29: mkha' 'gro grub pa'i rgyal mos brtsams //
T02D2144:220a-31: tshe dpag med pa red 'gyur shog //
T02D2144:220a-32: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po wa la tsandra bla ma dang //
